mapper.select: SELECT /* CommCodeMngDAO.selectCommCodeDetail */ B.CL_CODE_NM clCodeNm , A.CL_CODE clCode , A.CODE_ID codeId , A.CODE_ID_NM codeIdNm , A.CODE_ID_DC codeIdDc , A.USE_AT useAt FROM LETTCCMMNCODE A , LETTCCMMNCLCODE B WHERE A.CL_CODE = B.CL_CODE AND A.CODE_ID = #{codeId} AND B.CL_CODE = #{clCode}
mapper.delete: UPDATE /* CommCodeMngDAO.deleteCommCode */ LETTCCMMNCODE SET USE_AT = 'N' WHERE CODE_ID = #{codeId}
